# Shape function basis: as in arXiv:0807.1926
#   \phi_n(y) = \sqrt{n+1/2} P_n(y) and y(x) = y(x,3) [Eqs. (43),(47)]
#   Basis parameters: nmax = 7, \lambda = 0.7 GeV

# Theories:
# =========
#   tEgSFrun: Leading SF B -> Xs gamma rate for running perturbative scales.
#     SD scheme: delSD = del1Si
#     scales:    {muS, muJ, muH} = {rmuS[{4.7, 1.3, 2.2, 1.6, 0, _}], rmuJ[{4.7, 1.3, 2.2, 1.6, 0, _}], 4.7} GeV
#     order:     {fixed, run, expand} = {2, 2, False}
#     hard m_b:  mbH = 4.7 GeV
#   tEgNSrun: C7^2 nonsingular B -> Xs gamma rate for running perturbative scale.
#     SD scheme: delSD = del1Si
#     scale:     muNS = rmuNS[{4.7, 1.3, 2.2, 1.6, _, 0.5}] GeV
#     order:     fixed = 2
#     hard m_b:  mbH = 4.7 GeV

# bin = 0 {fEg, 1.9, 2.}
